Title: Cut migration costs with B-Series and Cobalt 100 VM support in Azure Migrate

## Smarter migrations start with smarter sizing - cut costs, boost efficiency, and migrate seamlessly with B-Series and Cobalt 100 VM support in Azure Migrate.

### Introduction

Migrating to the cloud shouldnâ€™t mean overspending. Many workloads â€” like dev/test environments, small databases, and low-traffic apps â€” donâ€™t need constant CPU power. So why pay for performance you rarely use?

Azure Migrate now supports **B-Series** and **Cobalt 100 VMs**, empowering you to plan migrations smarter, optimize costs, and get the right performance fit for every workload.

### B-Series VMs: Burstable power, lower costs

B-Series VMs are designed for workloads with variable CPU usage, delivering cost efficiency without compromising flexibility.

**Key Benefits:**

- **Baseline Performance:** Pay for a low, steady CPU baseline.
- **Burst Capability:** Scale up temporarily using credits accumulated during idle periods.
- **Cost Efficiency:** Ideal for workloads that stay idle most of the time but occasionally need high CPU, such as dev/test environments, small web servers, and batch jobs.

**Why it matters:**

- Perfect for variable CPU workloads.
- Save significantly by paying only for what you use.
- Now supported in Azure Migrate assessments for accurate cost planning.

A comparison of general-purpose D-series VM and B-series VM with other properties remaining same

| VM Type / SKU | vCPUs / RAM | Hourly Rate (USD) | Monthly Estimate\* | Notes | | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | | **Standard\_B8s v2**Â (B-series) | 8 vCPUs, 32 GiB RAM | | ~$270.10 (with Windows License) | Burstable VM, lower baseline cost | | **D8s v4**Â (D-series, newer gen) | 8 vCPUs, 32 GiB RAM | ~$0.384/hr | ~$548.96 (with Windows License) | General purpose D series |

You can save up to 50% if your workloads have occasional spikes in performance requirements.

### Cobalt 100 VMs: Native power for ARM64 workloads

Cobalt 100 VMs are ARM-native virtual machines optimized for modern, energy-efficient workloads. Theyâ€™re the ideal landing zone for ARM64-based servers running on-premises.

**Key Benefits:**

- **Architecture Alignment:** Migrate ARM64 workloads seamlessly, no re-architecting required.
- **Performance Gains:** Benefit from ARM-native optimizations for better efficiency.
- **Cost Advantages:** Combine ARM64 efficiency with Azureâ€™s flexible pricing to achieve more value per core.

**Why it matters:**

- Ideal for ARM64-based servers and applications.
- Unlock better performance-per-watt efficiency.
- Simplify planning with ARM64-ready assessments in Azure Migrate.

### Ready to get started?
